title: Episode #686 - Haunted Halloween Holocaust Party
description:
Comedians Kim Congdon & Sara Weinshenk join Big Jay Oakerson, Luis J. Gomez, and Dave Smith to discuss well endowed trans women, the new M&M and her message of body positivity, Kanye West’s white lives matter sweatshirt, and Sara and Kim’s creepy high school teachers. All This and More, ONLY on The Most Offensive Podcast on Earth, The LEGION OF SKANKS!!!  

Air Date: 10/05/22

Support our sponsors!

  • Head to RockAuto.com for all your auto-part needs, and let them know you heard about them on Legion of Skanks Podcast!
  • Fans over the age of 21, head to YoDelta.com and use promo code GAS for 25% off your order!
